text: Ngon izin Tuhan ureueng nyan meunang Jalut pahlawan binasa sudah Le Nabi Daod Jalut ka neucang Laen jiriwang bandum meunyerah Neubri keurajeun keu Nabi Daod Lom ngon hikeumat Neubri le Allah Peue nyang Neukheundak â€˜eleumee Neubri Keu Daod Nabi nyang raya tuah Adak kon Tuhan Neutulak bala Bak manusia ngon macam hilah Teuntee bumonyoe fased dum rusak Jimeutop meu tak jipubuet salah Tapi karonya Tuhan that raya Keu bandum hamba lam alam luah
